Name: Relative marker form
Description: the shape of the relative marker (when there are several forms for different genders
ColumnSpec: they are separated by a tilde (~)

Name: Number of genders or classes
Description: number of gender classes or inflectional classes

Name: Number of numbers
Description: Is the relative marker also used as an interrogative (or related to an interrogative)?

Name: INT
Description: is the relative marker also used as an interrogative? - values: yes, related, relatedmaybe, no, NA

Name: Proto-Indo-European origin
Description: source of the marker in Proto-Indo-European (*kw-

Name: Use as complementizer
Description: Is the relative marker also used as a complementizer?

Name: Spoken or written use
Description: Is the form used in spoken or written language?

Name: Relative marker forms
Description: the shapes of the all the relative markers in a language (separated by slash (/) if there are several)
